14.03.2013 GB SCR17995 Replaced screen button load logic by GB901
22.03.2012 SH SCR17182 Replaced GM900 by GB900 (program permission)
07.02.2009 GB SCR14368 Replaced 'F2'Kbd by RaiseEvent = Cancel
25.06.2007 AK SCR12645 cal OPH405C with alphnimeric prameters
25.06.2007 AK SCR12646 cal OPH405B with alphnimeric prameters
24.03.2006 SH SCR10704 Enabled closing of OPH405D window if program is finished
13.03.2006 SH SCR10607 Added storing of REPA_DEBC = PAYD_DEBC_DEBC
at the end of button "OK" handling; added storing of some PAYD fields and call
of ODH405C if PAYD_COLLECT = 'Y'
28.02.2006 CO SCR10496 Init PAYD_LETTER_TYPE with D2 insteade of D5
-- Only if OPH405D is finished the window has to be closed
-- Shortcut labels
-- Set variable blank, to avoid PAYD selections if PI.REPA_JOURNALNO = 0
because of too many selection of PAYD rows, could happened if OPH405D
is started with F7
-- Shortcut handling
-- Create letters / book off differences
-- Further updates PAYD_COLLECT = N
... booked off the difference
-- Further updates PAYD_COLLECT = Y
... book difference as new invoice
-- Only if OPH405D is finished the window has to be closed
-- Start handling to create letters / book of differences
... updates if PAYD_COLLECT = 'N' (OPH405B has to be called after DB storages in
current program)
... updates if PAYD_COLLECT = 'Y'
-- Payment difference is not booked yet (=PAYD_INVO_NO = 0) --> call OPH405C
to bool the difference as new invoice (OPH405B has to be called after DB
storages in current program)
